buginformation.summary: identifier minus negative number needs space between the
buginformation.description: what steps will reproduce the problem compile the attached file with java jar build compiler jar compilation level advanced optimizations bulletfail output file try run the file engine for example node what the expected output what you see instead the file does not parse properly because contains this subtraction negative number but looks like engines interpret decrementing and then fail parse the with space would parse what version the product are you using what operating system trunk closure compiler ubuntu please provide any additional information below thanks for the report see the problem this issue was closed revision 1775
